Jboss + Microsoft

Posted by connylundgren on September 28, 2005

Marc Fleury blogged about some groundbreaking news to be revealed, the pressrelease surfaced today.

Pardon me, but I am not that impressed. Integration with windows? Sure it’s a nice feature, but does JBoss on Windows really have a significant install base? And do you really want to tie you applications to yet another Proprietary system like Active Directory? Oh well I guess it doesn’t hurt, but I am not impressed… pressrelease
